head.supplied: ¶ [Suggests that enlarged edition of "Select Plants &c" be brought out for distribution during London Exhibition]...

div.p: No. 1996, vol. 1885 D, VPRS 1168/P inward correspondence registers, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Letter not found. Item is a register entry only for an item dated 23 February 1885 and registered on 25 February.
[Suggests that enlarged edition of "Select Plants &c" be brought out for distribution during London Exhibition]
See also M to G. Berry, 22 January 1885; T. Wilson to M, 26 February 1885 (in this edition as 85-02-26b); and M to G. Berry, 2 June 1885. M's letter was forwarded to the Victorian Commissioners for the Colonial and Indian Exhibition, which was to be held in London in 1886. A new edition of M's 'Select Plants' was issued at the end of 1885 (B85.12.03) but in his preface to this, dated August 1885, M makes no mention of the work's appearance being connected with the Exhibition.
